TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AudioFormatFlags extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Flags describing the stream in the .

remarks.para: The core set of flags describe properties of the audio stream (integer vs float values, endianess, interleaved) while the other flags are only used if the AudioFormatType is set to either LinearPCM (those are the values prefixed with LinearPCM) or AppleLossles (enumeration values prefixed with AppleLossles).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioFormatFlags AppleLossless16BitSourceData = unsigned int32(1)

Docs.summary: Apple Lossless data, native endian, signed integers, 16 bits.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioFormatFlags AppleLossless20BitSourceData = unsigned int32(2)

Docs.summary: Apple Lossless data, native endian, signed integers, 20 bits (24 bit aligned).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioFormatFlags AppleLossless24BitSourceData = unsigned int32(3)

Docs.summary: Apple Lossless data, native endian, signed integers, 24 bits.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioFormatFlags AppleLossless32BitSourceData = unsigned int32(4)

Docs.summary: Apple Lossless data, native endian, signed integers, 32 bits.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioFormatFlags CafIsFloat = unsigned int32(1)

Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioFormatFlags CafIsLittleEndian = unsigned int32(2)

Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioFormatFlags FlagsAreAllClear = unsigned int32(2147483648)

Docs.summary: Use this value to indicate that no flags are set. Use instead of the value zero, as that represents that no flag state is set.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioFormatFlags IsAlignedHigh = unsigned int32(16)

Docs.summary: If set, sample bits are on the high bits.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioFormatFlags IsBigEndian = unsigned int32(2)

Docs.summary: If this flag is set, the data is encoded in big endian format otherwise it is in little endian.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioFormatFlags IsFloat = unsigned int32(1)

Docs.summary: If this flag is set, the data is encoded using floating point values instead of integers.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioFormatFlags IsNonInterleaved = unsigned int32(32)

Docs.summary: If set, the data is non-interleaved (monophonic).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioFormatFlags IsNonMixable = unsigned int32(64)

Docs.summary: If set, the audio data is non-mixable.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioFormatFlags IsPacked = unsigned int32(8)

Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioFormatFlags IsSignedInteger = unsigned int32(4)

Docs.summary: If the data encoded using integers (the IsFloat flag is cleared) this determines whether they are signed or unsigned.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioFormatFlags LinearPCMFlagsAreAllClear = unsigned int32(2147483648)

Docs.summary: Linear PCM audio format: all flags are set to zero. Use this instead of zero, which means that no flags are configured.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioFormatFlags LinearPCMIsAlignedHigh = unsigned int32(16)

Docs.summary: Linear PCM audio format: if set, sample bits are on the high bits.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioFormatFlags LinearPCMIsBigEndian = unsigned int32(2)

Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioFormatFlags LinearPCMIsFloat = unsigned int32(1)

Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioFormatFlags LinearPCMIsNonInterleaved = unsigned int32(32)

Docs.summary: If this flag is set then there are separate s for each channel, otherwise the data for the left and right channels is interleaved in the same buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioFormatFlags LinearPCMIsNonMixable = unsigned int32(64)

Docs.summary: To be added.

Docs.summary: To be added.

Docs.summary: To be added.
